sentence.Network_en: The preparative conditions of salt resistance SAP by aqueous polymerization were investigated.
sentence.Network_cn: 采用水溶液法对合成耐盐性高吸水性树脂(SAP)的工艺条件进行了研究.

sentence.Network_en: Secretary Yu read out the report about preparative work of Branch establishment.
sentence.Network_cn: 会上,新当选的机关团支书俞晓文同志宣读了支部成立的筹备工作报告,并对当选后将要开展的工作做了简要介绍.

sentence.Network_en: The developed method is of high preparative capacity and high efficiency resolution.
sentence.Network_cn: 该法具有制备量大和分离效率高的特点.

preparation 制备preparative 制备的prepeak 前峰
the development of preparative high performance liquid chromatography ., 制备型高效液相色谱技术的研究进展.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Old French or from medieval Latin praeparativus, from Latin praeparat- 'made ready beforehand', from the verb praeparare (see prepare)

auth_sentence.content: The first Step, without any Preamble or Preparative, is downright Beastliness.
